author: elecharny
msg: o Added a flag in the Index Interface to allow an index not to have a reverse table
o Modified the JdbmIndex and AvlIndex table to check this flag before manipulating the reverse table
o Initialized the Presence, ObjectClass and entryCSN index with no reverse table
o Modified the SubstringEvaluator to use the evaluateWithoutIndex() method when the index does not have a reverse table
